millsfield:images_texts:
The artwork
on the front cover
of this menu was taken from
a collection of world images,
commissioned by British Airways
as part of our new corporate identity programme.
Without ever losing sight of our British roots,
these images help us to celebrate
our role as a true world citizen,
passionately committea
to serving our customers
around the globe.
Each image
has been created
by an artist or craftsperson
from a different region or community
to express a key element
of their life and culture.
Designs range from
Celtic and East Asian calligraphy
to Scottish tartans
and African wall paintings,
as well as rollsn Tolk art
North American tribal carvings,
Dutch delft ware and English ceramics.
2016.105.006
Lunch
*Fresh salad
with Parmesan cheese and croutons
served with Caesar dressing
*Roasted chicken
with French beans,
ratatouille and risotto
Seared peppered salmon
on mashed potatoes with leek
accompanied by carrots and asparagus
Summerberry shortcake
Coffee and tea
Cadbury's Dairy Milk
Light Meal
Italian style cold ham, salami
and cheese with focaccia bread
Meringue with chocolate mousse
Tea and coffee
*Well Being selection
We apologise if your choice is not available.
Bar Service
APERITIFS
Dry Sherry, Campari
Sweet or Dry Vermouth
SPIRITS
Scotch, American
or Canadian Whiskies
Gin, Rum, Vodka
WINES
Fine still and sparkling wines
from the vineyards of the world
DIGESTIFS
Single Malt Whisky, Cognac,
Drambuie, Cointreau, Tia Maria,
Baileys, Port
BEERS
English beer, Lager,
Low alcohol lager
SOFT DRINKS
A selection of soft drinks,
mineral water and fruit juices
Five-Alive
Champagne is available
for purchase
properties.sfomuseum:description: Menu issued by British Airways, World Traveller; tri-fold format; blue cover with color reproduction of Southern African artwork; contains lunch entrees including roasted chicken with French beans, ratatouille and risotto; menu number 269,279,283,285,287 WT QB AUG 320Y026-B98; class: World Traveller (economy); undated.
properties.wof:name: menu: British Airways, World Traveller class
